metadata.synopsis: The player has never spoken to Isobel before starting the assault on Moonrise. The Butler appears in front of the player on the bridge to Moonrise to remind the Dark Urge player that they must kill Isobel if they want to please Bhaal.

53.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
53.text: It is rather loathly of Sceleritas to disrupt your romp, but I cannot allow the Master to forget duty, and keep carousing like this.
53.context: NodeContext: With the greatest fear himself

3.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
3.text: I've been running hither and thither trying to speak with you again! But Master does rather shuffle about a lot. An old Butler's knees can't keep up.
3.context: NodeContext: With the greatest fear himself

34.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
34.text: Proof is required you are worthy of the inheritance you are very close to receiving.

50.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
50.text: A perfect crime awaits. You must go and kill this target, and you will be rewarded dearly.

15.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
15.text: The Moonmaiden Isobel... she is all but alone now... I have been watching her.
15.context: NodeContext: With the greatest fear himself

12.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
12.text: It will be easy. Her protectors have left. She thinks she can defend herself. She cannot, not against you.
12.context: NodeContext: With the greatest fear himself

2.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
2.text: Be a goodly sinner, and dash off to kill her posthaste... If you don't, I worry greatly for your future.
2.context: NodeContext: With the greatest fear himself

18.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
18.context: NodeContext: With the greatest fear himself

17.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
17.text: Have you forgotten? Whenever this frail carcass perishes, you shall always be sent a fresh Sceleritas.

10.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
10.text: You must have killed me hundreds of times since you were a youngling. I hope there will be hundreds more...

14.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
14.text: What will happen, if I don't do it?
14.context: NodeContext: With the greatest fear himself

27.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
27.text: I am not certain. You were never disobedient before your little accident.

31.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
31.text: You may kill in your sleep again. You may be executed. You might even be disinherited.

8.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
8.context: NodeContext: With the greatest fear himself

44.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
44.text: The Inn of Last Light. I can understand why you did not linger there. 'Tis rather a hovel.

20.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
20.text: But hovel or not - there is exquisite killing to be had there. Efficient killing!

32.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
32.text: This tower will still be here for you to bombard when you return.

26.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
26.text: Why do you want me to kill her?
26.context: NodeContext: With the greatest fear himself

52.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
52.text: Don't mistake me, Master, I want you to kill everyone.

16.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
16.text: This is simply a matter of royal principle. We hear of a darling thing shining a light in the darkness? We kill her!

54.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
54.text: If you do not, it will be terribly embarrassing for the both of us.

40.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
40.text: I don't want to harm her. I will save this cursed land.
40.context: NodeContext: With the greatest fear himself

28.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
28.text: What has come over you? You cut such a dapper figure, slashing apart the Grove...

9.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
9.text: Peasants love grovelling afore those of good breeding. The shameful poor Isobel protects want to die by your royal hand.

43.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
43.text: I'll go to her with knives.
43.context: NodeContext: With the greatest fear himself

1.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
1.context: NodeContext: With the greatest fear himself

24.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
24.text: You think Lord Ketheric is the worst foe you could face?
24.context: NodeContext: With the greatest fear himself

56.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
56.text: The Urge, Master... Fear the Urge.
56.context: NodeContext: With the greatest fear himself

48.speaker: Narrator
48.text: *In the depths of your liver, the bile salt bubbles, as if letting out a knowing chuckle.*

23.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
23.text: If you spite your loving Butler now, I shall be forced to report back home that you have been naughty.

19.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
19.text: I'm never obeying you. Do you hear me? Never!

13.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
13.text: This isn't me. I am not what I used to be.

30.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
30.text: I'm not doing anything unless you reveal my past.

47.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
47.text: It will come soon. Very soon. But we must impress our betters before you can be trusted with your old station...

25.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
25.text: Please, my Liege. Do not disappoint your Father... Kill the cleric at once - or else.

21.text: Apologies for my tardiness. I'll get right to it.

37.text: Now is the perfect time to finally kill you.
37.context: InternalNodeContext: Leads to the same combat state as if you attacked him at the Bhaal Temple MainDoor scene - he doesn't resist and gets the 'happy' state

42.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
42.text: Oh! Do! Do! If this frail carcass ever perishes, you will always be sent a fresh Butler.
42.context: InternalNodeContext: Leads to the same combat state as if you attacked him at the Bhaal Temple MainDoor scene - he doesn't resist and gets the 'happy' state

7.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
7.text: We shouldn't let you get too distracted. Make sure you kill her afterwards. And soon.
7.context: InternalNodeContext: Leads to the same combat state as if you attacked him at the Bhaal Temple MainDoor scene - he doesn't resist and gets the 'happy' state

29.context: InternalNodeContext: Leads to the same combat state as if you attacked him at the Bhaal Temple MainDoor scene - he doesn't resist and gets the 'happy' state

38.text: I just want to be left alone. I'm not doing this.

51.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
51.text: I have already indulged in one death here... but one more never hurts!

11.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
11.text: You've employed some skilled servants, my Liege! You murdered me very well! I cannot wait to see you unleash your minions upon the tower.
11.context: NodeContext: affection, like to a child

35.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
35.text: Oh, precious Liege. Look at you! All grown up and storming such a large tower! And with such wanton force!
35.context: NodeContext: affection, like to a child

41.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
41.text: You murdered me very well! And look at you! About to storm a whole tower!
